questions.question: What does “Internet of Value” stand for?

options.a: Internet based on the values of the society we live in.
options.b: Internet where the exchange of money (or any asset) is exchanged through the network as information is today.
options.c: The ability to connect people with many different values around the world, with no intermediaries.
options.d: Internet where digital assets are managed freely.

options.a: A private blockchain created to run smart contracts using bitcoins.
options.b: A Dapp created to exchange SmartCoins with Bitcoins
options.c: An open source smart contract platform that uses bitcoins as fuel
options.d: A platform to solve scalability problems on the Ethereum network.

questions.question: RSK Blockchain and Bitcoin blockchain are connected using...?

options.a: Hash of the blocks in both blockchains
